short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect your favorite CRM applications with your Kinect Hosted PBX phone system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kinect CRM Connector allows you to seamlessly connect all of your favorite CRM applications with your Cloud PBX phone system.  Enjoy screen-pops, clickable links that allow you to "click-to-call", and contact capture.  Contact your administrator and get started today!
